Start About Us Careers Events

Being Involved in the Community is Critical to Our Success

We choose to participate or lead events in areas where we can use our expertise to make a real positive impact.

Upcoming Events

  • TriDroid: Android Pay and the Fingerprint API

    February 18, 2016

    What is Android Pay? How do I use it? And for applicable devices, how can I authenticate the user with the fingerprint sensor? Presentation will include a demo with code samples.

Past Events

  • CocoaHeads January - Durham

    January 28, 2016

    The first CocoaHeads of 2016! Join us at the Ticketmaster Mobile Studio office in Durham for a great set of talks, pizza, and a chance to show off what you've been working on.

  • Networking with Intent #1

    October 21, 2015

    It's been a while since our last event–those of us that organize this meetup got acquired, so we've been a bit busy–but it's time to get back in the swing of things with something new: our first networking event.

  • Delightful User Experiences with Intent

    March 16, 2015

    Delightful user experiences: how to design UIs that are polite and forgiving, and have a great personality.

  • Accessibility with Intent

    January 13, 2015

    Join us on January 13th for a panel discussion on the all-too-important but oft-neglected topic of accessibility. We have a wonderful panel of experienced people, so bring your most burning questions on the topic.
